description: This file contains utility functions for filtering and sorting product data in an e-commerce platform. Functions include parsing multi-select query parameters, applying filters based on selected criteria, sorting products by various keys, and counting products by different facets.

methods.name: parseMulti(qs, key)
methods.description: Reads multi-select query parameters supporting repeated keys or comma-separated single values and returns an array of strings.

methods.name: applyFilters(products, selected)
methods.description: Filters an array of product objects based on selected filtering criteria such as families, sizes, collections, colors, badges, and price ranges.

methods.name: sortProducts(list, sortKey)
methods.description: Sorts a list of products based on the specified sort key, supporting price ascending/descending, new items, and best sellers.

methods.name: countByFacet(products, facets)
methods.description: Counts the number of products matching each facet category, such as families, sizes, collections, colors, price ranges, and badges.
